author: Lisa M
title: Great experience
text: On our first trip to Rome we decided to stay at this fabulous hotel. Within walking distance to everything with the exception of The Vatican.. however this can easily be reached by the "A" line metro which is a minutes walk from the hotel. In addition the reception staff are extremely pleasant and helpful. The restaurant Cotto linked to the hotel serves a lovely breakfast and its a lovely spot to finish off a day sightseeing sitting on the terrace sipping chianti. Can not fault this place at all. We hope to return on our next visit to Rome.
